Infectum.turoyo: lo=kə-mḥametumedemeni 419; hakka, aynad-ḥoḏ̣ərtamo, w də-mḥame u=saxlayḏa m-u=dew-awo d-qoṭe-le, u=məradayḏegəd-saymo-le 419; 67/221; ḥaminanšoyaʕ-wa feme d-u=hno d-u=naqwo d-ad=debure, w-ann=arbʕoḥrene, zəbṭi-waqayse, kətteappeṭarfe, daqanadə-mḥamənhawo d-kət-yoyatiwo, ʕal ad=debure
translations: ‘One of us would seal the entrance of the beehive, and the four other would take branches with leaves on them, so that they could protect the one, who was sitting (near the beehive), from the bees’ 72/3-4;
